summary: A hot summer. A private district with an enormous park. An abandoned plot of land in the suburbs and an uncontrollable wave of smoke spark uncertainty and chaos.
cast: Jonathan Da Rosa|Tatiana Giménez|Mirella Pascual|Claudia Cantero|Francisco Lumerman|César Bordón|Valeria Lois|Elsa Bois|Edgardo Castro|Mara Bestelli|Daniel Leguizamón|Marcelo Estebecorena
title: Historia del miedo
